What Is The Wild Robot About? Based on Peter Brown’s 2016 bestseller, the DreamWorks film follows a robot named Roz (voiced by The Black Panther’s Lupita Nyong’o) who is “shipwrecked on an uninhabited island and must adapt to the harsh surroundings,” according to the official synopsis. “Gradually, Roz starts building relationships with the animals on the island, including a clever fox (The Last of Us’ Pedro Pascal), and becomes the adoptive parent of an orphaned gosling named Brightbill (Heartstopper’s Kit Connor).” The voice cast also includes Bill Nighy (Love Actually), Stephanie Hsu (Everything Everywhere All at Once), Matt Berry (What We Do in the Shadows), Ving Rhames (Pulp Fiction), Mark Hamill (Star Wars) and Catherine O’Hara (Schitt’s Creek). Plus, the film features two original songs from country music singer Maren Morris. Looking for the next movie to screen at family movie night? Here’s how to watch The Wild Robot online from the comfort of your own home.

The film’s forthcoming streaming debut comes after a hugely successful theatrical run that has generated plenty of Oscars buzz. The DreamWorks animated movie took the top spot at the domestic box office on its opening weekend in September 2024, earning $324M globally and becoming the No. 1 non-sequel animation of 2024.

Additionally, The Wild Robot has been nominated for four Golden Globes, including Best Motion Picture, Cinematic and Box Office Achievement, Original Score and Original Song. So keep scrolling to find out all the ways to stream this family-friendly hit.

The Wild Robot lands on Peacock on Friday, Jan. 24, so you’ll need to subscribe to the platform to stream the movie from home.

In the meantime, the movie can be purchased or rented online to watch from the comfort of your own home. You can rent the movie for just $5.99 or buy it for $19.99 on Prime Video. (You do not need a Prime Video subscription to purchase or rent movies.)

How to Sign Up for Peacock to Watch The Wild Robot Online

Signing up for Peacock to watch The Wild Robot is easy. Below, we’re outlining step-by-step instructions for subscribing to Peacock in time to catch all the movie’s action:

  2. Click “Pick a Plan” to claim the deal
  3. Select a monthly or annual Premium or Premium Plus subscription plan
  4. Enter user information including name, email and birth date
  5. Enter payment information
  6. Start streaming The Wild Robot on Peacock!

Unfortunately, Peacock does not currently offer a free trial, so there is no way to watch The Wild Robot for free. Peacock free trials have been offered in the past, however, so if you really want to try out the streamer before you buy, check our Peacock FAQ page for all the updates on free trials and more Peacock perks.

What Is The Wild Robot About?

Based on Peter Brown’s 2016 bestseller, the DreamWorks film follows a robot named Roz (voiced by The Black Panther’s Lupita Nyong’o) who is “shipwrecked on an uninhabited island and must adapt to the harsh surroundings,” according to the official synopsis. “Gradually, Roz starts building relationships with the animals on the island, including a clever fox (The Last of Us’ Pedro Pascal), and becomes the adoptive parent of an orphaned gosling named Brightbill (Heartstopper’s Kit Connor).”

The voice cast also includes Bill Nighy (Love Actually), Stephanie Hsu (Everything Everywhere All at Once), Matt Berry (What We Do in the Shadows), Ving Rhames (Pulp Fiction), Mark Hamill (Star Wars) and Catherine O’Hara (Schitt’s Creek). Plus, the film features two original songs from country music singer Maren Morris.
